text: José Alves, nicknamed Zague (August 10, 1934 – January 19, 2021) was a Brazilian footballer. He played for Corinthians in his home country, and Club América in Mexico. Alves died on January 19, 2021 at the age of 86.Fallece José Alves, leyenda del América y padre de Zague ==References== ==Other websites== * Club América player profile Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Footballers from Bahia
title: Zague (footballer, born 1934)
